description: Identify the year with the highest sales volume of tea.
Determine the sales volume in tonnes for the year 2011.
Find the range of sales volumes recorded from 2008 to 2019.
Calculate the average sales volume of tea from 2008 to 2019.
Identify any year where the sales volume significantly deviated from the general trend.
Are there any observable clusters of years with similar sales volumes?
Analyze the correlation between the year and the sales volume.
Which years had a sales volume higher than 140,000 tonnes?
Rank the years from highest to lowest sales volume.
What percentage of years had a sales volume below 135,000 tonnes?
